爭.definition: to strive for; to vie for; to argue or debate; deficient or lacking (dialect); how or what (literary)

爭先.definition: to compete to be first; to contest first place

爭先恐後.definition: striving to be first and fearing to be last (idiom); outdoing one another

爭光.definition: to win an honor; to strive to win a prize

爭分奪秒.definition: lit. fight minutes, snatch seconds (idiom); a race against time; making every second count

爭取.definition: to fight for; to strive for; to win over

爭取時效.definition: to strive to get sth done while the timing is right

爭取時間.definition: to act with urgency; to buy time

爭名奪利.definition: to fight for fame, grab profit (idiom); scrambling for fame and wealth; only interested in personal gain

爭執.definition: to dispute; to disagree; to argue opinionatedly; to wrangle

爭奪.definition: to fight over; to contest; to vie over

爭妍鬥艷.definition: contending for supreme beauty (esp. of flowers, scenery, painting etc); vying in beauty and glamor

爭強好勝.definition: competitive; ambitious and aggressive; to desire to beat others

爭得.definition: to obtain by an effort; to strive to get sth

爭持.definition: to refuse to concede; not to give in

爭搶.definition: to fight over; to scramble for

爭斤論兩.definition: to haggle over every ounce (idiom); to to fuss over minor points; to be particular about sth

爭權奪利.definition: scramble for power and profit (idiom); power struggle

爭氣.definition: to work hard for sth; to resolve on improvement; determined not to fall short

爭相.definition: to fall over each other in their eagerness to...

爭臣.definition: minister not afraid to give forthright criticism

爭衡.definition: to struggle for mastery; to strive for supremacy

爭論.definition: to argue; to debate; to contend; argument; contention; controversy; debate; CL:次[ci4],場|场[chang3]

爭購.definition: to compete; to fight for; to rush to purchase

爭長論短.definition: lit. to argue who is right and wrong (idiom); fig. to squabble; to argue over minor issues

爭霸.definition: to contend for hegemony; a power struggle

爭面子.definition: to do (sb) proud; to be a credit to (one's school etc); to make oneself look good; to build up one's image

爭風吃醋.definition: to rival sb for the affection of a man or woman; to be jealous of a rival in a love affair
